about_the_game:
FG Cemetery Map Pack

The Cemetery Map pack has more than 100 images for your spooky map creations. Create endless cemeteries and graveyards that can be used in your games. The Cemetery Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. These images have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Brushes of walls, fences, cracks, stone tile paths, and more
  • Decorations that include sarcophagus, gravestones, gates, stone slabs and roofs ,and more
  • Effects of specialized grave mound shadows, stone cracks, and more
  • Tiles of stone work with grave markers
detailed_description:
FG Cemetery Map Pack

The Cemetery Map pack has more than 100 images for your spooky map creations. Create endless cemeteries and graveyards that can be used in your games. The Cemetery Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. These images have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Brushes of walls, fences, cracks, stone tile paths, and more
  • Decorations that include sarcophagus, gravestones, gates, stone slabs and roofs ,and more
  • Effects of specialized grave mound shadows, stone cracks, and more
  • Tiles of stone work with grave markers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.

Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
